thread.title: Axway CEO Jean-Marc Lazzari Engages Industry Leaders in Journey to Digital Business at Connections Conference
thread.title_full: Axway CEO Jean-Marc Lazzari Engages Industry Leaders in Journey to Digital Business at Connections Conference

author: admin
title: Axway CEO Jean-Marc Lazzari Engages Industry Leaders in Journey to Digital Business at Connections Conference
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/18/2015 @ 11:00 PM   Axway 
PHOENIX -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- To help IT and business executives accelerate the adoption of new digital business models, Axway, (Euronext:AXW.PA), a market leader in governing the flow of data, will host Axway Connections North America in Scottsdale, Arizona from October 19-22, 2015. Held at the Scottsdale Plaza Resort, the conference will enable IT and business leaders from more than 90 companies across different industries to apply the latest trends, best practices and technologies in their journey to digital business. 
The digital economy has changed the rules of business. As new digital ecosystems are created by cloud, mobility and the Internet of Things and as data flows between them skyrocket, many business models are being reshaped – and for some – becoming obsolete overnight. 
“Digital technologies are a game changer and present organizations in all industries with exciting opportunities to transform the customer experience and create new business opportunities,” said Jean-Marc Lazzari, CEO, Axway. “To embrace these changes, organizations need to rethink the existing systems, processes and relationships in order to innovate, compete and prosper. At Axway Connections, we are excited to be able to gather top industry thought leaders to learn how they are preparing their technology foundation for rapid engagement with new digital ecosystems.” 
Axway Connections 2015 will feature keynotes from: Jeanine Banks , EVP of Global Products and Solutions, Axway Nigel Fenwick , Vice President, Principal Analyst, Forrester Research Chris Stauch, Creative Director, Deloitte Digital 
Attendees will be able to learn from the real-world digital transformation stories and attend sessions hosted by our partners with: Ann Lloyd, Vice President, Customer & User Experience, Axway James Bligh, Senior Manager Commercial Feasibility, National Australia Bank Kamron Abtahi, Product Director, DaaS Engineer, Dun & Bradstreet Kevin Kohut, Global API Management Integration & Enablement Lead, Accenture Mark O’Neill, Vice President, Innovation, Axway Matt Graney, Vice President, Portfolio Planning, Axway Jessica Devita, Solutions Architect, Chef Narayanan Chathanur, Enterprise Digital Architect & Client Executive, Infosys 
The four-day conference will feature a combination of roundtable discussions, collaborative breakout sessions, technical workshops and networking opportunities in the areas of API management , integration, and analytics. Axway Connections 2015 also includes a dedicated Innovation Zone to give attendees the opportunity to work with Axway experts to determine how they can successfully manage the journey to digital. 
Axway Connections 2015 is sponsored by APIMetrics , Axiomatics , and SmartBear . 
Read Don Dixon’s blog post : “Accelerate Your Journey to Digital – Join Us at Connections!” 
Follow Axway on Twitter: @Axway #AxwayConnections 
About Axway 
Axway (Euronext:AXW.PA), a market leader in governing the flow of data, is a global software company with more than 11,000 public- and private-sector customers in 100 countries. For more than a decade, Axway has empowered leading organizations around the world with proven solutions that help manage business-critical interactions through the exchange of data flowing across the enterprise, among B2B communities, cloud and mobile devices. Our award-winning solutions span business-to-business integration, managed file transfer, operational intelligence, API and identity management, and email security– offered on premise and in the Cloud with professional and managed services.Axway is registered in France with headquarters in the United States and offices in 19 countries. www.axway .com 
About Axway 5 Suite 
Axway 5 Suite offers control and optimization of the flow of data through integration, visibility, policy, security and reliability to govern business-to-business interactions, communities, systems and data types — within and beyond the enterprise edge.
